statements: UPDATE plant_watering_schedule SET water_duration = '2 hours' WHERE schedule_id = 'e0459887-6d86-4c86-926d-b922d07bb1c7';

UPDATE plant_watering_schedule SET moisture_threshold = 0.6, plant_id = '7b9d3e08-59c5-4dc6-b54e-85cdea4705e1' WHERE schedule_time < '2022-10-01 08:00:00';
